description: I do not get many tips on waterfalls after exploring for many years in NS.  However Jonathan G gave me the tips on this one.  Thanks, it's a beauty! Follow the brook from the road and see a first fall that may be dry within 200m from bushwacking from the road.  after that follow the brook downstream bypassing countless cascades.  At the fork, continue downtream for another 900m until the lower fall set amidst an evergreen stand.
directions: Highway 2 to Five Islands. Turn on New Brittain Rd. Park at N45 27 19.7 W64 01 31.3. Follow brook downstream to falls.
title: Neds Brook Falls
